_88first_published_at.description: The date the content was first published.  Automatically determined by the publishing-api, unless overridden by the publishing application.

_88analytics_identifier.description: A short identifier we send to Google Analytics for multi-valued fields. This means we avoid the truncated values we would get if we sent the path or slug of eg organisations.

_88public_updated_at.description: When the content was last significantly changed (a major update). Shown to users.  Automatically determined by the publishing-api, unless overridden by the publishing application.
